appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Webfeed enables users to read RSS or Atom feeds in their browser, providing a user-friendly way to stay current with their favorite websites, news sources, blogs, and podcasts. This tool streamlines access to feed content, making it easier for users to stay informed.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button
